items.name: Garden Mantis
items.tooltip: Found around the Kilima Lake biome in Kilima. Also has a chance to be found when foraging around the Kilima Lake biome in Kilima.

items.name: Vampire Crab
items.tooltip: Vampire Crabs can be found exclusively on the beaches surrounding the Flooded Fortress between the hours of 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM.

items.name: Mutated Angler
items.tooltip: Found in caves using worms.

items.name: Void Ray
items.tooltip: Found in caves using glow worms.

items.name: Green Pearl
items.tooltip: ~3% chance to receive from Unopened Oyster

items.name: Stripeshell Snail
items.tooltip: Stripeshell Snails can be found along the coastline in Bahari Bay, including Coral Shores, Lighthouse Lagoon, Beachcomber Cove, and the Flooded Fortress from 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM.

items.name: Blue Marlin
items.tooltip: Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using worms.

items.name: Sushi
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: Fishing from Ponds using a Glow Worm.

items.name: Inky Dragonfly
items.tooltip: The Inky Dragonfly can be found at any time of day near rivers and ponds in Bahari Bay.

items.name: Trout Dinner
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: The recipe for Trout Dinner can be found in Einar's Cave after reaching friendship level 3.

items.name: HydratePro Fertilizer
items.tooltip: Can be purchased at the general store in batches of 20 for 40 gold.

items.name: Giant Goldfish
items.tooltip: Found in ponds using glow worms.

items.name: Fisherman's Brew
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: The recipe for Fisherman's Brew can be purchased from Einar at Fishing Level 5.

items.name: Enchanted Pupfish
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms.

items.name: Shimmerfin
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Lake using worms.

items.name: Long Nosed Unicorn Fish
items.tooltip: Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms during the day.

items.name: Radiant Sunfish
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Rivers using worms.

items.name: Flametongue Ray
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Rivers using glow worms.

items.name: Striped Sturgeon
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Lake using worms in the evening and night.

items.name: Dawnray
items.tooltip: Found in Bahari Rivers without bait in the morning from 3 AM to 6 AM.

items.name: Emberseeker Medallion
items.tooltip: The first medallion is given to the player by Jina when you complete Vault of the Flames, while the other five are located in treasure chests hidden around Bahari Bay.

items.name: Paper Lantern Bug
items.tooltip: Paper Lantern Bugs can be found from 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM along the coastline of Bahari Bay. They can also be found during these same hours in the forests of north Bahari Bay.

items.name: Bahari Glowbug
items.tooltip: Bahari Glowbugs can be found from 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM throughout the fields and cliffs south Bahari Bay.

items.name: Spitfire Cicada
items.tooltip: Spitfire Cicadas can be found attached to medium and large Sapwood trees anywhere in Bahari Bay between the hours of 3:00 AM - 6:00 PM.

items.name: Firebreathing Dragonfly
items.tooltip: The Firebreathing Dragonfly can be found around the Mirror Pond Ruins, Mirror Fields, and by the Daiya Family Farm in Kilima Valley during any time of day.

items.name: Chapaa Masala
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: Can be purchased for 2,500 Gold.

items.name: Heat Root
items.tooltip: Found in Bahari Bay on cliffs. There is a 2-minute window from the first pick before it disappears.

items.name: Phoenixfire Relleno
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: Can be bought at the Cooking Guild Store for 2,000 Gold.

items.name: Dari Cloves
items.tooltip: Dari Cloves can be found in the Northern part of Bahari Bay, from Flooded Steps up to Thorny Thickets, and over to Statue Garden.

items.name: Rainbow Trout
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Rivers without bait.

items.name: Thundering Eel
items.tooltip: Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms.

items.name: Giant Kilima Stingray
items.tooltip: Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms in the morning, day, and evening.

items.name: Stormray
items.tooltip: Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms in the morning and evening.

items.name: Jewelwing Dragonfly
items.tooltip: The Jewelwing Dragonfly spawns exclusively on the cliffs above Pavel Mines in Bahari Bay. It can be found at any time of day.

items.name: Gossamer Veil Moth
items.tooltip: Gossamer Veil Moths can be found between 6:00 PM - 3:00 AM around Kilima Valley, including Leafhopper Hills and Reflection Fields.

items.name: Golden Glory Bee
items.tooltip: A Golden Glory Bee has a 10% chance to spawn after cutting down medium or large Sapwood trees around Kilima Valley during the morning and day.

items.name: Rainbow-Tipped Butterfly
items.tooltip: The Rainbow-Tipped Butterfly can be found between the hours of 3:00 AM - 6:00 PM throughout the fields and cliffs of southern Bahari Bay, including Pulsewater Plains, Hideaway Bluffs, and above the Pavel Mines.

items.name: Crab Pot Pie
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: The recipe can be bought at the Cooking Guild Store for 1,000 Gold.

items.name: Apple Pie
items.tooltip: This recipe can be obtained after reaching level three friendship with Delaila and gaining access to her room after completing either Fertile Ground or Berry Blues.

items.name: Blueberry Pie
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: Can be bought from Reth when you have obtained Cooking.png Cooking level 6 for Gold.png 1,500 Gold.

items.name: Shepp's Pie
items.tooltip: Obtaining the Recipe: Can be bought at the Cooking Guild Store for Gold.png 1,500 Gold.

items.name: Stormseeker Medallion
items.tooltip: The first medallion is given to the player by Zeki when you complete Vault of the Gales, while the other five are located in treasure chests hidden around Bahari Bay.
